refnamediv.refpurpose: Numbers each line in a verbatim environment

listitem.para: The verbatim element to create the line numbering for

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template outputs a string with line numbers for each line in a verbatim elements. Each line number is on its own line, allowing the output string to be placed to the side of the verbatim output.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Determines the starting line number for a verbatim element

listitem.para: The verbatim element to determine the starting line number for

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template determines the starting line number for a verbatim element using the continuation attribute. The template finds the first preceding element of the same name, counts its lines, and handles any startinglinenumber or continuation element it finds on that element.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Determines the number to use for the first listitem in an orderedlist

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template determines the starting number for an orderedlist element using the continuation attribute. Thi template finds the first preceding orderedlist element and counts its list items. If that element also uses the continuation, this template calls itself recursively to add that element's starting line number to its list item count.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Outputs the name of a person

listitem.para: The element containing tags such as firstname and surname
The language rules to use to construct the name

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template outputs the name of a person as modelled by the personname element. The personname element allows authors to mark up components of a person's name, such as the person's first name and surname. This template assembles those into a string.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Outputs a list of people's names

listitem.para: The elements containing tags such as firstname and surname
The language rules to use to construct the list of names

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This template outputs a list of names of people as modelled by the personname element. The personname element allows authors to mark up components of a person's name, such as the person's first name and surname. This template makes a list formatted according to the locale set in lang and calls the template db.personname for each element in nodes.
